head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HOLMAN, RICHARD A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HOLMAN, RICHARD A.

block.p: HOLMAN-Richard A. On September 18th, 2000. Age 77. Beloved husband of Mary Patricia. Devoted father of Jonathan, Beth and Jeffrey. Cherished grandfather of Elizabeth, Eva and Alexander Holman and Mark and Paul Sawyier. Devoted brother of Leonore Greiman, Ruth Fleischner and Marjorie Sunshine. Beloved uncle of many nieces and nephews. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave at 81 St. on Tuesday 7 to 9PM. Funeral service Wednesday, 10 AM.
